channel.title: Talks By L. Aldin Porter
channel.description: General Conference talks by L. Aldin Porter.

image.title: General Conference talks by L. Aldin Porter.

item.title: Follow the Brethren
item.description: Shortly after this call came to me, I was traveling by plane from Baton Rouge, Louisiana, to Salt Lake City. A young businessman stepped to my seat in the plane and introduced himself as a Latter-day Saint. He asked if I was traveling to attend meeti

item.title: “A Disciple of Jesus Christ”
item.description: Elder L. Tom Perry made reference this afternoon to additional millions and millions of people who now may hear the glorious message of the restored gospel. The Lord has, in the recent past, opened the doors of nations long denied the blessings of go

item.title: The Revelations of Heaven
item.description: A few years ago I was in a Salt Lake hospital emergency room with my sons and a neighbor boy—the result of a backyard touch football game.

item.title: The Spirit of Prophecy
item.description: One hundred seventy-six years ago, an event occurred which lies at the very foundation of the Restoration of the gospel in these latter days. It is, in my judgment, the most significant event that has occurred in this world since the Son of God walke

item.title: Our Destiny
item.description: The center of the plan is the Lord Jesus Christ. Reject or ignore Him, and the great plan of happiness cannot function in your behalf.

item.title: “To Bear Testimony of Mine Only Begotten”
item.description: A spiritual witness of the Nephite scripture will always bring the certainty of the Savior’s existence.
